message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $180, but I can't go any lower than that. It's a very high-quality item.
I understand it's a high-quality item, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
